channel.title: [Runesource] thiving new npcs how do i add a new npc to be thived?
channel.description:
how do i add more thiving npcs i am using 2006scape source
heres the code
[CODE]HAM_MEMBER(new String[] { "H.A.M Member" }, 15, 22, new Item[] { new Item(882, 5), new Item(1351), new Item(1205), new Item(1265), new Item(1349), new Item(1267), new Item(886, 15), new Item(1353), new Item(1207, 1), new Item(1269, 1), new Item(1129, 1), new Item(4302, 1), new Item(4304, 1), new Item(4298, 1), new Item(4308, 1), new Item(4300, 1), new Item(4310, 1), new Item(4306, 1) }, 6, 5), HAM_MEMBER2(new String[] { "H.A.M Member" }, 20, 22, new Item[] { new Item(882, 5), new Item(1351), new Item(1205), new Item(1265), new Item(1349), new Item(1267), new Item(886, 15), new Item(1353), new Item(1207, 1), new Item(1269, 1), new Item(1129, 1), new Item(4302, 1), new Item(4304, 1), new Item(4298, 1), new Item(4308, 1), new Item(4300, 1), new Item(4310, 1), new Item(4306, 1) }, 6, 5),[/Code]

item.title: [Runesource] thiving new npcs how do i add a new npc to be thived?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“jessewhitley, post:1, topic:529814”]how do i add more thiving npcs i am using 2006scape source

heres the code

	[CODE]HAM_MEMBER(new String[] { "H.A.M Member" }, 15, 22, new Item[] {  new Item(882, 5), new Item(1351), new Item(1205), new Item(1265), new Item(1349), new Item(1267), new Item(886, 15), new Item(1353), new Item(1207, 1), new Item(1269, 1), new Item(1129, 1), new Item(4302, 1), new Item(4304, 1), new Item(4298, 1), new Item(4308, 1), new Item(4300, 1), new Item(4310, 1), new Item(4306, 1) }, 6, 5),
	HAM_MEMBER2(new String[] { "H.A.M Member" }, 20, 22, new Item[] {  new Item(882, 5), new Item(1351), new Item(1205), new Item(1265), new Item(1349), new Item(1267), new Item(886, 15), new Item(1353), new Item(1207, 1), new Item(1269, 1), new Item(1129, 1), new Item(4302, 1), new Item(4304, 1), new Item(4298, 1), new Item(4308, 1), new Item(4300, 1), new Item(4310, 1), new Item(4306, 1) }, 6, 5),[/Code][/quote]

What’s the issue? It has all the information you need to make a new one. BLAH(new String[] { “blahnameofnpc” }, not entirely sure what these two numbers are without seeing the code?? …and rest is self explanatory as it says new item

Read full topic
